attributes.additional_details: People will be happier coming into work enhancing performance as they are more likely to get the work done. Studies show that 12.7% of all sickness absence days in the UK can be attributed to mental health conditions. Less working days means more time with family increasing mental health. Personally, having a 3 day weekend in the past has left me feeling refreshed and ready to start the week with a positive manner.
attributes.background: Working 5 days a week is far too long and can be very draining especially on the young people starting off after having short days at school. A lot of people dread going to work which causes a lack of motivation. By shortening the working week to 4 days, there will be less sick days. See below......
